amendment.description: To enable States to receive federally guaranteed loans for the benefit of nonentitlement areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2852 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2852 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11404) To enable States to receive federally guaranteed loans for the benefit of nonentitlement areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2852 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2852 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Reed.
